description.p: Mtoc is a visually-rich music player and library browser that emphasizes a smooth, continuous experience with album artwork at the forefront.

ul.li: Animated, visual browsing made for music fans who enjoy flipping through albums
Library browsing with smart organization and responsive search
"Bento Box" layout places large-scale album art with playback controls and your library side by side
Advanced queue management with library context menus and drag-and-drop reordering
Save playlists from your queue, manage M3U files, and use the intuitive playlist editor
Directory picker and one-click scanning extracts track metadata
Lightweight database layer stores tags and thumbnails to keep your library responsive
Desktop integration with full MPRIS 2 support
GStreamer-based playback engine with support for a wide variety of formats and gapless playback

description.p: Fixed laggy image loading during fast scrolling in the album carousel

ul.li: Improved performance in album carousel with delegate recycling and improved connection handling
Implemented multithreaded asynchronous image response for higher performance thumbnail loading
Improved thumbnail size efficiency
Dynanic pixmap cache sizing based on available system memory for improved image loading performance

description.p: Functional overhaul expanding library management, playback features, and interface

ul.li: Support for queue management and context menus for queue actions
M3U playlist support
Playlist management with saving and editing playlists
Shuffle and repeat modes
All Songs virtual playlist for playback of the entire library
Track info panel
State persistence between sessions for queue, playback state, and interface selection
New animations throughout the interface
